verses.verse: And <S%G1161><s%> he spake <S%G3004><s%> <S%G2532><s%> a parable <S%G3850><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%> <S%G4314><s%> to this end, that men ought <S%G1163><s%> always <S%G3842><s%> to pray <S%G4336><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> to faint <S%G1573><s%>;

Saying <S%G3004><s%>, There was <S%G2258><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> a <S%G5100><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> a <S%G5100><s%> judge <S%G2923><s%>, which feared <S%G5399><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, neither <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3361><s%> regarded <S%G1788><s%> man <S%G444><s%>: in a city: Gr. in a certain city

And <S%G1161><s%> there was <S%G2258><s%> a widow <S%G5503><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> city <S%G4172><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> she came <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Avenge <S%G1556><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> of <S%G575><s%> mine <S%G3450><s%> adversary <S%G476><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he would <S%G2309><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> for <S%G1909><s%> a while <S%G5550><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> afterward <S%G5023><s%> <S%G3326><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> within <S%G1722><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%>, Though <S%G1499><s%> I fear <S%G5399><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, nor <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> regard <S%G1788><s%> man <S%G444><s%>;

Yet <S%G1065><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> widow <S%G5503><s%> troubleth <S%G3930><s%> <S%G2873><s%> me <S%G3427><s%>, I will avenge <S%G1556><s%> her <S%G846><s%>, lest <S%G3363><s%> by <S%G1519><s%> her continual <S%G5056><s%> coming <S%G2064><s%> she weary <S%G5299><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>.
And <S%G1161><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> said <S%G2036><s%>, Hear <S%G191><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> the unjust <S%G93><s%> judge <S%G2923><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> shall <S%G1557><s%> not <S%G3364><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> avenge <S%G4160><s%> <S%G1557><s%> his own <S%G846><s%> elect <S%G1588><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> cry <S%G994><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> night <S%G3571><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, though <S%G2532><s%> he bear long <S%G3114><s%> with <S%G1909><s%> them <S%G846><s%>?

I tell <S%G3004><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he will <S%G4160><s%> avenge <S%G1557><s%> them <S%G846><s%> speedily <S%G5034><s%> <S%G1722><s%>. Nevertheless <S%G4133><s%> when <S%G687><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> cometh <S%G2064><s%>, shall he find <S%G2147><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%>?

And <S%G1161><s%> he spake <S%G2036><s%> <S%G2532><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> parable <S%G3850><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> certain <S%G5100><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> trusted <S%G3982><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> themselves <S%G1438><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> they were <S%G1526><s%> righteous <S%G1342><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> despised <S%G1848><s%> others <S%G3062><s%>: that: or, as being righteous

Two <S%G1417><s%> men <S%G444><s%> went up <S%G305><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the temple <S%G2411><s%> to pray <S%G4336><s%>; the one <S%G1520><s%> a Pharisee <S%G5330><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the other <S%G2087><s%> a publican <S%G5057><s%>.

The Pharisee <S%G5330><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> and prayed <S%G4336><s%> thus <S%G5023><s%> with <S%G4314><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%>, God <S%G2316><s%>, I thank <S%G2168><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> as <S%G5618><s%> other <S%G3062><s%> men <S%G444><s%> are, extortioners <S%G727><s%>, unjust <S%G94><s%>, adulterers <S%G3432><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> publican <S%G5057><s%>.
I fast <S%G3522><s%> twice <S%G1364><s%> in the week <S%G4521><s%>, I give tithes <S%G586><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> that <S%G3745><s%> I possess <S%G2932><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the publican <S%G5057><s%>, standing <S%G2476><s%> afar off <S%G3113><s%>, would <S%G2309><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> lift up <S%G1869><s%> so much as <S%G3761><s%> his eyes <S%G3788><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> smote <S%G5180><s%> upon <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> breast <S%G4738><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, God <S%G2316><s%> be merciful <S%G2433><s%> to me <S%G3427><s%> a sinner <S%G268><s%>.

I tell <S%G3004><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>, this man <S%G3778><s%> went down <S%G2597><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> house <S%G3624><s%> justified <S%G1344><s%> rather than <S%G2228><s%> the other <S%G1565><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%> every one <S%G3956><s%> that exalteth <S%G5312><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> shall be abased <S%G5013><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> he that humbleth <S%G5013><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> shall be exalted <S%G5312><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> they brought <S%G4374><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> infants <S%G1025><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> he would touch <S%G680><s%> them <S%G846><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> when his disciples <S%G3101><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> it, they rebuked <S%G2008><s%> them <S%G846><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> called <S%G4341><s%> them <S%G846><s%> unto him, and said <S%G2036><s%>, Suffer <S%G863><s%> little children <S%G3813><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> forbid <S%G2967><s%> them <S%G846><s%> not <S%G3361><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> of such <S%G5108><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.

Verily <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, Whosoever <S%G3739><s%> shall <S%G1209><s%> not <S%G3362><s%> receive <S%G1209><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> a little child <S%G3813><s%> shall <S%G1525><s%> in no wise <S%G3364><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> therein <S%G1519><s%> <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> ruler <S%G758><s%> asked <S%G1905><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Good <S%G18><s%> Master <S%G1320><s%>, what <S%G5101><s%> shall I do <S%G4160><s%> to inherit <S%G2816><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life <S%G2222><s%>?

And <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Why <S%G5101><s%> callest thou <S%G3004><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> good <S%G18><s%>? none <S%G3762><s%> is good <S%G18><s%>, save <S%G1508><s%> one <S%G1520><s%>, that is, God <S%G2316><s%>.

Thou knowest <S%G1492><s%> the commandments <S%G1785><s%>, Do <S%G3431><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> commit adultery <S%G3431><s%>, Do <S%G5407><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> kill <S%G5407><s%>, Do <S%G2813><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> steal <S%G2813><s%>, Do <S%G5576><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> bear false witness <S%G5576><s%>, Honour <S%G5091><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%>.
And <S%G1161><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%>, All <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> have I kept <S%G5442><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> youth <S%G3503><s%> up.

Now <S%G1161><s%> when Jesus <S%G2424><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%>, he said <S%G2036><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Yet <S%G2089><s%> lackest <S%G3007><s%> thou <S%G4671><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> thing: sell <S%G4453><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that <S%G3745><s%> thou hast <S%G2192><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> distribute <S%G1239><s%> unto the poor <S%G4434><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> thou shalt have <S%G2192><s%> treasure <S%G2344><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> come <S%G1204><s%>, follow <S%G190><s%> me <S%G3427><s%>.
And <S%G1161><s%> when he heard <S%G191><s%> this <S%G5023><s%>, he was <S%G1096><s%> very sorrowful <S%G4036><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> he was <S%G2258><s%> very <S%G4970><s%> rich <S%G4145><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> that he <S%G846><s%> was <S%G1096><s%> very sorrowful <S%G4036><s%>, he said <S%G2036><s%>, How <S%G4459><s%> hardly <S%G1423><s%> shall they <S%G1525><s%> that have <S%G2192><s%> riches <S%G5536><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>!

For <S%G1063><s%> it is <S%G2076><s%> easier <S%G2123><s%> for a camel <S%G2574><s%> to go <S%G1525><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> a needle's <S%G4476><s%> eye <S%G5168><s%>, than <S%G2228><s%> for a rich man <S%G4145><s%> to enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.
And <S%G1161><s%> they that heard <S%G191><s%> it said <S%G2036><s%>, Who <S%G5101><s%> then <S%G2532><s%> can be <S%G1410><s%> saved <S%G4982><s%>?

And <S%G1161><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%>, The things which are impossible <S%G102><s%> with <S%G3844><s%> men <S%G444><s%> are <S%G2076><s%> possible <S%G1415><s%> with <S%G3844><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>.
Then <S%G1161><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> said <S%G2036><s%>, Lo <S%G2400><s%>, we <S%G2249><s%> have left <S%G863><s%> all <S%G3956><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Verily <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, <S%G3754><s%> There is <S%G2076><s%> no man <S%G3762><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> hath left <S%G863><s%> house <S%G3614><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> parents <S%G1118><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> wife <S%G1135><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> children <S%G5043><s%>, for <S%G1752><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God's <S%G2316><s%> sake <S%G1752><s%>,

Who <S%G3739><s%> shall <S%G618><s%> not <S%G3364><s%> receive <S%G618><s%> manifold more <S%G4179><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> present time <S%G2540><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the world <S%G165><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> everlasting <S%G166><s%>.

Then <S%G1161><s%> he took <S%G3880><s%> unto him the twelve <S%G1427><s%>, and said <S%G2036><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, Behold <S%G2400><s%>, we go up <S%G305><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> that are written <S%G1125><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the prophets <S%G4396><s%> concerning the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> shall be accomplished <S%G5055><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> he shall be delivered <S%G3860><s%> unto the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> shall be mocked <S%G1702><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> spitefully entreated <S%G5195><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> spitted on <S%G1716><s%>:

And <S%G2532><s%> they shall scourge <S%G3146><s%> him, and put <S%G615><s%> him <S%G846><s%> to death <S%G615><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> the third <S%G5154><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> he shall rise again <S%G450><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G846><s%> understood <S%G4920><s%> none <S%G3762><s%> of these things <S%G5130><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> saying <S%G4487><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> hid <S%G2928><s%> from <S%G575><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, <S%G2532><s%> neither <S%G3756><s%> knew they <S%G1097><s%> the things which were spoken <S%G3004><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> it came to pass <S%G1096><s%>, that as <S%G1722><s%> he <S%G846><s%> was come nigh <S%G1448><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> Jericho <S%G2410><s%>, a certain <S%G5100><s%> blind man <S%G5185><s%> sat <S%G2521><s%> by <S%G3844><s%> the way side <S%G3598><s%> begging <S%G4319><s%>:
And <S%G1161><s%> hearing <S%G191><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> pass by <S%G1279><s%>, he asked <S%G4441><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> it <S%G5124><s%> meant <S%G1498><s%>.
And <S%G1161><s%> they told <S%G518><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> of Nazareth <S%G3480><s%> passeth by <S%G3928><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> he cried <S%G994><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, thou Son <S%G5207><s%> of David <S%G1138><s%>, have mercy <S%G1653><s%> on me <S%G3165><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they which went before <S%G4254><s%> rebuked <S%G2008><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> he should hold his peace <S%G4623><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G846><s%> cried <S%G2896><s%> so much <S%G4183><s%> the more <S%G3123><s%>, Thou Son <S%G5207><s%> of David <S%G1138><s%>, have mercy <S%G1653><s%> on me <S%G3165><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%>, and commanded <S%G2753><s%> him <S%G846><s%> to be brought <S%G71><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%>: and <S%G1161><s%> when he <S%G846><s%> was come near <S%G1448><s%>, he asked <S%G1905><s%> him <S%G846><s%>,

Saying <S%G3004><s%>, What <S%G5101><s%> wilt thou <S%G2309><s%> that I shall do <S%G4160><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%>? And <S%G1161><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%>, Lord <S%G2962><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> I may receive my sight <S%G308><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Receive thy sight <S%G308><s%>: thy <S%G4675><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> hath saved <S%G4982><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> immediately <S%G3916><s%> he received his sight <S%G308><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, glorifying <S%G1392><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%>, when they saw <S%G1492><s%> it, gave <S%G1325><s%> praise <S%G136><s%> unto God <S%G2316><s%>.
